name: .ZZQ
summary: Learn about .ZZQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a ZZQ file in NASPA Zyzzyva (multiplatform). To do so:
Select File â†’ Quiz... from the program's menu bar.
In the New Quiz window, select Load Quiz....
Navigate to and open your ZZQ file.
You can also open a ZZQ file in Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor to view the XML data it contains.
